title: Able Muse Anthology
description: Poetry. Fiction. Literary Nonfiction. Art. The ABLE MUSE ANTHOLOGY celebrates Able Muse's journey through its first decade and beyond by showcasing the best of the published poetry, fiction, essays, interviews, book reviews, art and photography, including a foreword by Timothy Steele. This anthology has received high praise and acclaim from Dana Gioia, David Mason, Charles Martin, Catharine Savage-Brosman, X. J. Kennedy, Catharine Savage Brosman and others.
author: Timothy Steele
